spell_tooltip.description:
Your Heroism spell now has a 60 sec. cooldown, but increases Haste by 20%, and only affects you and your friendly target when cast for 10 sec.

In addition, Heroism is no longer affected by Exhaustion.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 207,251 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 82,826 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 83,538 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 83,113 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.
Chills the target with frost, causing 127,235 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 15,265 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 39 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.5 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 358,861 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 33% chance to trigger three extra attacks, dealing 34,740 Physical damage each.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 229,552 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon. Lava Lash will spread Flame Shock from your target to 5 nearby targets.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 373,697 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 3% or Mastery by 6% for 10 sec.

If Lava Burst is known, Elemental Blast replaces Lava Burst and gains 1 additional charge.
Melee auto-attacks with Flametongue Weapon active have a 5% chance to reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 75% and increase the damage of Lava Lash by 40% for 6 sec.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 137,186 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing 396,599 Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for 2 sec.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, it increases the damage of your next Lava Lash by 8% up to 64%, and reduces the cooldown of your Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 234,569 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 71,109 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.

The cooldown of Sundering is reduced by 10 sec, but it can no longer Incapacitate. 

Sundering has a 40% chance to reset its own cooldown, increased by 12% for up to 5 targets. Each consecutive reset reduces these chances by half.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.

Crash Lightning damage increased by 40%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 955,258 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 25% for 8 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 163,032 Flamestrike, 163,299 Froststrike, 165,596 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 168,844 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 93,303 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

Frost Shocks empowered by Hailstorm, Lava Lash, and Fire Nova cause your Searing totems to shoot a Searing Volley at up to 5 nearby enemies for 177,855 Fire damage.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 613,757 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

While Hot Hand is active Lash Lava shatters the earth, causing a Sundering at 50% effectiveness.

Sunderings from this effect do not Incapacitate.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

When Flametongue Weapon triggers from Windfury Weapon attacks, it has a chance to gather a whirl of flame around the target, dealing 300% of its damage to all nearby enemies.
Increases the critical strike chance of Flametongue Weapon by 25%, and its critical strike damage by 100%.
Casting Sundering within 40 yards of your Surging Totem causes it to create a Tremor at 100% effectiveness at the target area.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Air: Your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning or Elemental Blast unleashes 3 Surging Bolts at your Surging Totem.

Earth: Direct damage of your next Flame Shock is increased by 300% and it is applied to 5 nearby enemies.

Fire: Your next Lava Lash or Fire Nova grants you Hot Hand for 6 sec.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 206,520 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 83,120 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.

Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, it increases the damage of your next Lava Lash by 8% up to 64%, and reduces the cooldown of your Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Lava Lash and Sundering increases the damage of Flame Shock on its target by 100% for 20 sec.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 942,282 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 25% for 8 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 166,068 Flamestrike, 163,035 Froststrike, 167,007 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 168,844 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 613,757 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Summons a totem at your feet that shakes the ground around it for 13 sec, removing Fear, Charm and Sleep effects from party and raid members within 39 yards.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.

Your Stormstrike casts restore 2,625 mana to you and 4 allies nearest to you within 40 yards.

Allies can only benefit from one Shaman's Mana Spring effect at a time, prioritizing healers.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.5 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 358,861 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 33% chance to trigger three extra attacks, dealing 35,056 Physical damage each.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 226,460 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon. Lava Lash will spread Flame Shock from your target to 5 nearby targets.
Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 370,898 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 3% or Mastery by 6% for 10 sec.

If Lava Burst is known, Elemental Blast replaces Lava Burst and gains 1 additional charge.
Melee auto-attacks with Flametongue Weapon active have a 5% chance to reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 75% and increase the damage of Lava Lash by 40% for 6 sec.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 137,186 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing 403,591 Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for 2 sec.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, it increases the damage of your next Lava Lash by 8% up to 64%, and reduces the cooldown of your Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.

The cooldown of Sundering is reduced by 10 sec, but it can no longer Incapacitate. 

Sundering has a 40% chance to reset its own cooldown, increased by 12% for up to 5 targets. Each consecutive reset reduces these chances by half.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 953,976 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Increases the chance to gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon by 4%, and whenever you gain a stack of Maelstrom Weapon, the cooldown of Feral Spirits is reduced by 1.0 sec.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 25% for 8 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 162,591 Flamestrike, 166,759 Froststrike, 161,818 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 168,844 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 91,362 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

Frost Shocks empowered by Hailstorm, Lava Lash, and Fire Nova cause your Searing totems to shoot a Searing Volley at up to 5 nearby enemies for 179,042 Fire damage.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 613,757 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

While Hot Hand is active Lash Lava shatters the earth, causing a Sundering at 50% effectiveness.

Sunderings from this effect do not Incapacitate.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

When Flametongue Weapon triggers from Windfury Weapon attacks, it has a chance to gather a whirl of flame around the target, dealing 300% of its damage to all nearby enemies.
Increases the critical strike chance of Flametongue Weapon by 25%, and its critical strike damage by 100%.
Casting Sundering within 40 yards of your Surging Totem causes it to create a Tremor at 100% effectiveness at the target area.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Air: Your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning or Elemental Blast unleashes 3 Surging Bolts at your Surging Totem.

Earth: Direct damage of your next Flame Shock is increased by 300% and it is applied to 5 nearby enemies.

Fire: Your next Lava Lash or Fire Nova grants you Hot Hand for 6 sec.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 207,892 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 83,239 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

If Chain Lightning hits more than 1 target, each target hit by your Chain Lightning increases the damage of your next Crash Lightning by 10%.

Each target hit by Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of Crash Lightning by 0.5 sec.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased cast speed and damage.

Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 613,757 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

Increases the damage of Surging Totem by 18%.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects.

Earth: Direct damage of your next Flame Shock is increased by 300% and it is applied to 5 nearby enemies.

Fire: Your next Lava Lash or Fire Nova grants you Hot Hand for 6 sec.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 207,700 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 175,036 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Chills the target with frost, causing 123,096 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.

Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.

Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting.

Windfury causes each successive Windfury attack within 15 sec to increase the damage of Windfury by 15%, stacking up to 5 times.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 5 nearby enemies.
Windfury Weapon has a 100% chance to trigger a third attack.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 373,501 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 3% or Mastery by 6% for 10 sec.

If Lava Burst is known, Elemental Blast replaces Lava Burst and gains 1 additional charge.
Melee auto-attacks with Flametongue Weapon active have a 5% chance to reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 75% and increase the damage of Lava Lash by 40% for 6 sec.

Unleash a devastating storm around yourself, dealing 137,186 Stormstrike damage every 1 sec to nearby enemies for 8 sec.

Increases your chance to activate Windfury Weapon by 200%, and the damage of Windfury Weapon by 10%.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 melee swings after dealing a critical strike with a spell or ability.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, it increases the damage of your next Lava Lash by 8% up to 64%, and reduces the cooldown of your Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.
Increase the chance for Mastery: Enhanced Elements to trigger Windfury and Stormsurge by 150%.
Stormstrike has a 25% chance to strike the target an additional time for 40% of normal damage. This effect can chain off of itself.

Stormstrike has an additional charge.

Stormsurge now also causes your next Stormstrike to deal 25% additional damage as Nature damage, stacking up to 2 times.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.
Lava Lash and Sundering increases the damage of Flame Shock on its target by 100% for 20 sec.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 964,758 Elemental damage.

Primordial Wave generates 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon.

Summons two Spirit Wolves that aid you in battle for 15 sec. They are immune to movement-impairing effects, and each Feral Spirit summoned grants you 15% increased Physical damage dealt by your abilities.

Feral Spirit generates one stack of Maelstrom Weapon immediately, and one stack every 3 sec for 15 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Stormstrike damage is increased by 20%, and Stormstrike, Lava Lash, and Ice Strike have a 100% chance to generate 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Your damaging abilities have a 6% chance to summon a Feral Spirit for 8 sec.
Consuming 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon will reset the cooldown of Stormstrike and increases the damage of your Physical and Frost abilities by 25% for 8 sec.

Primordial Wave transforms into a single use Primordial Storm for 15 sec after it is cast.

Primordial Storm
Devastate nearby enemies with a Primordial Storm dealing 166,769 Flamestrike, 166,578 Froststrike, 166,448 Stormstrike damage, and unleashing a Lightning Bolt or a Chain Lightning at 150% effectiveness. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Consumes Maelstrom Weapon for increased damage.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 168,844 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 92,330 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

Frost Shocks empowered by Hailstorm, Lava Lash, and Fire Nova cause your Searing totems to shoot a Searing Volley at up to 5 nearby enemies for 178,310 Fire damage.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 613,757 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

While Hot Hand is active Lash Lava shatters the earth, causing a Sundering at 50% effectiveness.

Sunderings from this effect do not Incapacitate.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

When Flametongue Weapon triggers from Windfury Weapon attacks, it has a chance to gather a whirl of flame around the target, dealing 300% of its damage to all nearby enemies.
Increases the critical strike chance of Flametongue Weapon by 25%, and its critical strike damage by 100%.
Casting Sundering within 40 yards of your Surging Totem causes it to create a Tremor at 100% effectiveness at the target area.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 209,556 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 10 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20% and increase its damage by 25% or its healing by 25%.

A maximum of 10 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
Removes all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 60% for 8 sec.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Your Healing Surge is 25% more effective on yourself.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 15,368 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them upward. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.

Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.

Deal 89,764 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.6 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 177483.9.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 10% increased health for 10 sec.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 13 yards by 10%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 218,086 over 9 sec.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 855,914. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.
Earth Shield and Water Shield no longer lose charges and are 115% effective.

Casting Surging Totem has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 22 sec.

 Downpour
A burst of water at your Surging Totem's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for 448,207 and increases their maximum health by 10% for 6 sec.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed has a 0.6% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into an Air Ascendant for 15 sec, immediately dealing 398,484 Nature damage to any enemy within 8 yds, reducing the cooldown and cost of Stormstrike by 60%, and transforming your auto attack and Stormstrike into Wind attacks which bypass armor and have a 30 yd range.

Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Elemental Blast has a chance to unleash a Surging Bolt at your Surging Totem, increasing the totem's damage by 10%, and then redirecting the bolt to your target for 168,844 Nature damage. The damage bonus effect can stack.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.

Lava Lash has a chance to summon a Searing Totem to hurl Searing Bolts that deal 91,466 Fire damage to a nearby enemy. Lasts 8 sec.

Frost Shocks empowered by Hailstorm, Lava Lash, and Fire Nova cause your Searing totems to shoot a Searing Volley at up to 5 nearby enemies for 178,683 Fire damage.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 613,757 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

While Hot Hand is active Lash Lava shatters the earth, causing a Sundering at 50% effectiveness.

Sunderings from this effect do not Incapacitate.

Increases the chance for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.

When Flametongue Weapon triggers from Windfury Weapon attacks, it has a chance to gather a whirl of flame around the target, dealing 300% of its damage to all nearby enemies.
Increases the damage of Surging Totem by 18%.
Casting Sundering within 40 yards of your Surging Totem causes it to create a Tremor at 100% effectiveness at the target area.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects.
